name: nativescript-couchbase
description: Couchbase Lite plugin for Telerik NativeScript

scripts.demo.ios: npm run preparedemo; cd demo; tns emulate ios
scripts.demo.android: npm run preparedemo; cd demo; tns emulate android
scripts.preparedemo: npm run build; cd demo; tns plugin remove nativescript-couchbase; tns plugin add ..; tns install
scripts.setup: cd demo; npm install; cd ..; npm run build; cd demo; tns plugin add ..; cd ..

author: Nic Raboy
